events.message: I received my order yesterday but want to request a refund because the product is not what I expected and I’m quite disappointed.
The reported issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's mention of wanting their money back.
An agent has been assigned to the customer's refund case to assist with processing the request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I understand you would like a refund, and I’m here to help you with that.
Could you please provide the order number and the reason for your refund request so that I can check the details?
Sure, my order number is #123456789. The product does not match the description on the website and lacks important features.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated your refund request, and you should see the amount credited back to your payment method within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for handling that quickly. I appreciate your help and look forward to receiving the refund soon.
The refund case is now resolved from our side. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just following up to ensure you have received the refund successfully and everything is now satisfactory.
Since the refund has been processed and confirmed, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting us.
